Title: Relates to directing the division of homeland security and emergency services to conduct review and analysis of security measures at rail yards and issue related reports and recommendations
Summary: Directs the division of homeland security and emergency services to conduct a review and analysis of security measures at rail yards and to issue related reports and recommendations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to directing the division of homeland security and emergency services to conduct a review and analysis of security measures at rail yards
